title: Refactor Expander.TryExecuteWellKnownFunction
body:
### Refactor candidate

I have stumbled upon the piece of code and suggest to rethink it:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/28f488a74ed75bf5f21ca93ac2463a8cb1586d79/src/Build/Evaluation/Expander.cs#L3643

It contains code duplications and it's current size poorly manageable.
